name: Death is not an option
description:
You will die ... at some point at least you have to die to find out what is waiting for you in the afterlife ... lol.  

Try to overcome several challenges in this endless runner of deathly deaths. Well... the theme for this game jam 2022 was "Death is only the beginning".

So.... Try to survive as long as you can in your afterlife.

Have fun with my first ever,  selfmade game <3

Unfortunately I didnt have much time to further the game, corona hit me hard :O
